content: By: Miriam Ellis April 8, 2024 How to Acknowledge and Cope with Fear of Local Business Reviews Local SEO | Reputation Management Review neglect can erode your local business’ reputation, but fear of reviews is valid. Miriam Ellis walks you through acknowledging, reframing, and diminishing fears you or your clients may have. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 10, 2023 Celebrating Canada’s Small Business Month With Sustainable Local Biz Tips Local SEO | Reputation Management Happy Small Business Month! In this article, Miriam displays that by making sustainable local goods and services easier for everyone to find and choose online, we can work towards healing the climate together. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis September 26, 2023 Takeaways from an Irish Locksmith Listing Spam Scandal Local SEO | Reputation Management In this article, Miriam discusses how to protect yourself from local listing spam, along with how local businesses can combat spam on their own listings, and build trust in their communities. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis August 21, 2023 What Diners Write About Most: A Study of Restaurant Review Place Topics Local SEO | Reputation Management Find out what diners write about most in their reviews in Miriam’s new study. Understand the sentiment behind customer reviews and use 'Place Topics' to improve areas that customers talk about the most, to ultimately enhance your restaurant's reputation and attract new customers. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis July 19, 2023 How to Get More Local Business Reviews from Travelers Local SEO | Reputation Management Finding the most effective way to get travelers to review your local business will gift you with better local search rankings, a persuasive reputation, and a lucrative upward trend in transactions. Read this post By: Samantha Heald April 25, 2023 Our Online Reputation Management Playbook Reputation Management Online reputation management can be daunting – but advantageous – for brands or individuals that are seeing their search engine displays implicated by third-party content, and want to take the reins. Today, Samantha shares how she and her team at Go Fish Digital work with clients to understand the sensitive issue they’re facing and meet their goals. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 11, 2020 Location Data + Reviews: The 1–2 Punch of Local SEO (Updated for 2020) Local SEO | Reputation Management Consistent NAPs get your business found — positive reviews get it chosen. Communicate this to your local SEO clients using owner responses, authenticity and honesty, rapid responses at a good pace, and more. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis August 27, 2019 Kindness as Currency: How Good Deeds Can Benefit Your Local Business Local SEO | Marketing Industry | Reputation Management As a local business owner, you have a practical means of parsing kindness, as it can turn up in unstructured citations, reviews, and social media. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis May 30, 2018 Getting Real with Retail: An Agency’s Guide to Inspiring In-Store Excellence Local SEO | Reputation Management When your agency encounters a client with a slew of negative reviews, it's a symptom of a bigger brick-and-mortar problem. But as a digital marketer, you're far from powerless when it comes to the in-store experience. Read this post By: Joy Hawkins February 21, 2018 How to Deal with Fake Negative Reviews on Google Local SEO | Reputation Management When someone posts a false negative review about your business, it can be surprisingly difficult to get it removed. Check out how one local search expert dealt with harmful false reviews and see what options exist for when it happens to you. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers December 13, 2017 Moz the Monster: Anatomy of an (Averted) Brand Crisis Branding | Reputation Management On November 10, John Lewis' "Moz the Monster" campaign launched, rewriting SERPs and presenting a potential threat to our brand. Here's how we handled the crisis. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis December 5, 2016 How to Respond to the 5 Types of Google Reviews Local SEO | Reputation Management You don't have to feel intimidated by reviews—owner responses are actually great for your local business. Miriam Ellis describes the 5 types of Google reviews and how to best respond. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 27, 2016 Local Empathy: The New Tool in Your Brand's Emergency Kit Local SEO | Reputation Management The way two brands reacted during Hurricane Matthew resulted in priceless positive media coverage for one, and a slew of one-star reviews for the other. Miriam Ellis shows how your local SEO strategy can go beyond your office walls to make your brand (and community) great. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis August 3, 2016 Diagramming the Story of a 1-Star Review Local SEO | Reputation Management What earns a business a 1-star review? Not all negative reviews can be avoided, but the way you handle the situation can hugely impact how many stars you earn. Miriam dissects exactly what goes into a bad review and how to deal with it — professionally. Read this post
